{{disambig-more: '''Concerning Hobbits''' is the first part of the [[The Lord of the Rings Prologue
Concerning Hobbits: Prologue]] to ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.

{{disambig-more: ''Concerning Hobbits'' details the history of [[Hobbits]] from their origins in the [[Vales of Anduin
Concerning Hobbits: Vales]] of [[Anduin]], to their movement into [[Eriador]], their trusteeship of [[The Shire]], and the events leading up to the [[War of the Ring]]. Concerning Hobbits also provides a broad description of the physical characteristics of Hobbits, as well as their manners, customs and important families.
